item.fbombs.dynamite_stick.tooltip: Use with an ignition item to throw
advancement.fbombs.split_tnt_block.desc: "I just sawed this TNT Block in half!"
magisterium.spell.fbombs.crimson_explosi: ᴄᴏᴍᴘᴏɴᴇɴᴛs: up to three objects infused with explosive element
Summon a beam of light that detonates with a devastating blast of pure magical power.
Additional items increase the power of spell.
ᴋᴏʀᴇ ɢᴀ ᴊɪɴʀᴜɪ ꜱᴀɪᴅᴀɪ ɴᴏ ɪʀʏᴏᴋᴜ ɴᴏ ᴋᴏᴜɢᴇᴋɪ ꜱʜᴜᴅᴀɴ, ᴋᴏʀᴇ ᴋᴏꜱᴏ ɢᴀ ᴋʏᴜᴜᴋʏᴏᴋᴜ ɴᴏ ᴋᴏᴜɢᴇᴋɪ ᴍᴀʜᴏᴜ, ᴇxᴘʟᴏꜱɪᴏɴ!
